sense.def:
To spell a word
pomeni napisati ali izgovoriti črko za črko v besedi v pravilnem zaporedju.

seg.quote: Ninety per cent of the words were spelt wrong.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
spells a particular result
, lahko pričakujemo, da bo imelo določene posledice.

seg.quote: Nuclear conflict would spell the end of life as we know it.
Any discussion of politics would spell disaster.

sense.def:
A spell of an activity or type of weather
je krajše obdobje neke dejavnosti ali vrste vremena.

seg.quote: She had a spell as editor.

sense.def:
V otroških pravljicah je
a spell
niz besed, ki naj bi imele čudežni učinek.

seg.quote: The spell of the wicked fairy was broken.

sense.def:
To spell something out
pomeni nekaj podrobno razložiti.

seg.quote: Let me try and spell out what I mean by that.
